      • switchPlayers

      • initPlayers

        public static boolean initPlayers()
        Guides the user through the name selection.
        Returns:
        Returns true, if all dialogs were completed successfully and false if the user cancelled the operation

      • doAiTurn

        public void doAiTurn(GameJTable currentGameTable,
                     GameGUI callerGUI,
                     Player opponent)
        Decides where the AI will do its next turn by implementing the Mini-Max-Algorithm Needs the reference to the callerGUI to send it the info about the played spot
        Parameters:
        currentGameTable - The gameTable of the current game situation
        callerGUI - the GameGUI which calls the AI
        opponent - The Player object of the opponent
